message: I really just want to know why Chris felt it necessary to comment on a post about two men getting married, just to basically tell them he does not approve (or Jesus or Satan or God doesn't approve, I dunno anymore). Why couldn't you have just seen this, said something to yourself, and moved on? What possessed you to make your initial post in the first place? Do you think after this couple reads it, they are going to quickly discover religion, get a divorce, and forever change their ways? What was your purpose for getting involved in the first place?

Seaworld has not taken animals from the wild in over 30 years. Management has changed three times since then. Look at what they stand for now.. Conservation and rescue. The parks help fund that.. I think they do way more good than bad and the media sensationalizes the extremists point of view. Let's all look at the big picture here. Where would we be without Seaworld?
